metadata.businessValue:
Our clients see a rapid and sustained increase in adoption of Microsoft 365. Our unique approach to working with Digital Champions ensures they become the driving force behind your change and embed transformation that sticks. Ensuring:

*  Reduced time to M365 benefit realisation
*  Reduced cost of end user training and communications
*  Increased user productivity
*  Reduced Service Desk disruption/traffic
*  Stronger Programme perception from Senior Leadership down to end user

descriptionParagraphs.name: Short description
content: Drive change with a fully managed digital champions network.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Long description
content: Our Champions Programmes are designed exclusively to create a sustainable standalone, managed service to identify, engage, educate and grow a network of highly effective Digital Champions.​ Using our experience working with 100’s of organizations, we have taken all of the best elements to give you the definitive out of the box Digital Champion Programme.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business need or problem
content:
You may have already heard or discovered that building and managing a network of Microsoft 365 Digital Champions is challenging.

*  How do you identify and recruit Champions?
*  How do you engage Champions and keep them active?
*  How do you keep up to date with all the great updates and features added to M365?
*  How do you build in OnDemand and live learning?
*  How do you measure success?

Programmes can fail when organisations do not have the time, resource, knowledge, or enthusiasm to effectively manage this critical group of change agents.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Business solution
content:
The YourChampions program is designed to engage a community of Champions from the beginning. We have created a structured offering that engages your Champions, delivers real world, up to date learning and assesses their competency.

Champions are incentivised to learn and share their knowledge and ideas within your organisation through our set of unique Champion Challenges. The Champions community grows and remains engaged and enthused to help and share through our digital badge awards, gamified approach, and social learning techniques.

All delivered via your Microsoft 365 platform.

descriptionParagraphs.name: Success factors
content: Driving your organization forward to achieve true digital transformation, Digital Champions ensure success.
